abstract.text: Support In-App Purchases and interactions with the App Store.
Information about a registered product in App Store Connect.
Values representing the duration of an interval, from a day up to a year.
The total size of the content, in bytes.
A string that identifies the version of the content.
An array of subscription offers available for the auto-renewable subscription.
The lengths of the downloadable files available for this product.
A string that identifies which version of the content is available for download.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the App Store has downloadable content for this product.
The object containing introductory price information for the product.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the App Store has downloadable content for this product.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the product is available for Family Sharing in App Store Connect.
A description of the product.
The name of the product.
The cost of the product in the local currency.
The locale used to format the price of the product.
The string that identifies the product to the Apple App Store.
The identifier of the subscription group to which the subscription belongs.
The period details for products that are subscriptions.
The details of an introductory offer or a promotional offer for an auto-renewable subscription.
An object containing the subscription period duration information.
An object that can retrieve localized information from the App Store about a specified list of products.
An App Store response to a request for information about a list of products.
Retrieve up-to-date information about the products for sale in your app to display to your customers.

abstract.text: Offer discounted pricing for auto-renewable subscription products to eligible subscribers.

abstract.text: Load the unique identifiers for your in-app products to retrieve product information from the App Store.

abstract.text: Provide service to share subscriptions and non-consumable products to family members.

abstract.text: The root class of most Objective-C class hierarchies, from which subclasses inherit a basic interface to the runtime system and the ability to behave as Objective-C objects.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type with a customized textual representation suitable for debugging purposes.
A type whose instances can be encoded, and appropriately passed, as elements of a C `va_list`.
A thread-safe type whose values can be shared across arbitrary concurrent contexts without introducing a risk of data races.
